views.markdown:
Compatible with the iPhone X (tested on iOS 11.1.2 and till 12.4).

HideDoneButtonX Simply Hides (but doesn't Disable) the Ugly Editing Done Button in the SpringBoard on the iPhone X!

Just Swipe Top Right Everywhere to Exit the Editing Icons Mode.

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshot below.

Thanks to my Brother @lorenzo_noide for testing the Final Release.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.1
- Added support for arm64e/A12 (thanks Jonas for testing).
